Text:
"Almost" not worth downloading.
The torrent works and it is a perfect copy of the cd. The cd however was NOT remastered properly from the vinyl LP masters by the company that produced it. The wave tops are chopped giving this cd remastered version distortion. Try and find a rip from vinyl that was done properly if you can.
Historically there are several interesting and controversial reasons why this happened frequently with digital conversions in the 1990s through the early 2000s.
Email me if you want to know more about the historical perspective.
